name: Sub Dash
description:
Controls

Space - Thrust

A or Left arrow to turn left

D or Right Arrow to turn right

Click M to go back to Main Menu

*Goal* Reach the other end of the map and land on landing pad without touching any thing

First Upload on to my account.  Purpose was to practice basic movement and use some of the knowledge I learned previously through GameDev.tv.

Intentions are to start working on a 3rd Person Castle Defense Game.  Just a stepping stone.  All support is appreciated!
